testsuite.name: Bad Request 400 (id = eqw, give the string vale is 400 bad request),The server could not understand the request. Maybe a bad syntax?

testcase.name: Response time is less than 200ms
testcase.failure: Failed 1 times. Collection JSON ID: cc876387-058f-4985-8abc-b4471c2d6170. Collection name: Petstore Negative Api Testing. Request name: Bad Request 400 (id = eqw, give the string vale is 400 bad request),The server could not understand the request. Maybe a bad syntax?. Test description: Response time is less than 200ms. Error message: expected 1155 to be below 500. Stacktrace: AssertionError: expected 1155 to be below 500 at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:3:2).

testcase.name: Body is correct

failure.message: expected response body to equal 'unknown' but got '{"code":400,"type":"unknown","message…'

testcase.failure: Failed 1 times. Collection JSON ID: cc876387-058f-4985-8abc-b4471c2d6170. Collection name: Petstore Negative Api Testing. Request name: Bad Request 400 (id = eqw, give the string vale is 400 bad request),The server could not understand the request. Maybe a bad syntax?. Test description: Body is correct. Error message: expected response body to equal 'unknown' but got '{"code":400,"type":"unknown","message…'. Stacktrace: AssertionError: expected response body to equal 'unknown' but got '{"code":400,"type":"unknown","message…' at Object.eval sandbox-script.js:4:2).
